## Darwin Core Basics

![](img/DwC_archive.png)



-  OBIS minimum required fields:
   -  eventID
   -  eventDate
   -  decimalLatitude
   -  decimalLongitude
   -  occurrenceID
   -  occurrenceStatus (e.g. present/absent)
   -  basisOfRecord (e.g. HumanObservation)
   -  scientificName
   
- Extended measurement or fact (eMoF)
